oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Subterranean 2.0 Cipher Suite
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Daemen, Joan
Massolino, Pedro Maat Costa
Mehrdad, Alireza
Rotella, Yann
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: lightweight
permutation-based crypto
deck function
XOF function
session authenticated encryption
NIST lightweight competition
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper presents the Subterranean 2.0 cipher suite that can be used for hashing, MAC computation, stream encryption and several types of authenticated encryption schemes. At its core it has a duplex object with a 257-bit state and a lightweight single-round permutation. This makes Subterranean 2.0 very well suited for low-area and low-energy implementations in dedicated hardware.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: IACR Transactions on Symmetric Cryptology; Volume 2020, Special Issue 1 ; 262-294
